values.description: Do you give us permission to access your apartment when you are not in?

questions.question: When would you like us to come and unblock your shower?

values.description: Please give us a date and time (from tomorrow onwards) and we will be in contact to confirm.

email.subject: Shower unblocked
email.body: We are pleased to let you know that our maintenance team have now unblocked your shower.  If you have any further issues please re-report it at our concierge desk.

email.subject: Shower status
email.body: Please note that our maintenance team have taken a look at your shower and have not been able to unblock it.  They report: [1c2168e394296d].  The issue will remain on our system and you will be notified of any updates.

email.subject: shower status
email.body: Please note that the maintenance team have taken a look at your shower and have reported the following: [1c2168e394296d].  This issue has now been marked as completed.
